message:
runExperiment now uses DataSource to load any type of file
runExperiment adds the original Exception to exceptions that it throws itself to give user more of an idea what when wrong

added: throw new Exception("[Error] Failed to Load Instances from file '" + filename + "'", e);
throw new Exception("[Error] Failed to Get Options from @Relation Name", e);
throw new Exception("Failed to Remove Range", e);
deleted: throw new Exception("[Error] Failed to Load Instances from file");
throw new Exception("[Error] Failed to Get Options from @Relation Name");
throw new Exception("Failed to Remove Range");
